properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 10:13AM CST until February 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the Saint
Francis River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Saint Francis River near Saint Francis
* from Thursday February 13 until Saturday February 15.
* At 09 AM Tuesday the stage was...21.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 22.5 feet on Friday February 14.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday February 13 and
continue to rise to near 22.5 feet by Friday February 14. The river
will fall below flood stage by Saturday February 15.
* At 23.0 feet...Most lowland inside the levee system is flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Wednesday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
